name: Easy Lemon Bars
author: Peggy
summary: These bars are great and easy to make. Hope you like them!
ingredients: 1 (18.25 ounce) package lemon cake mix with pudding
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Pour cake mix into a large bowl
Add the egg and oil; mix until well blended
Reserve one cup for the topping, and pat the rest into an ungreased 9x13 inch pan
Bake for 15 minutes in the preheated oven
Meanwhile, in a medium bowl, beat the cream cheese with the sugar and lemon juice until smooth
Spread the mixture evenly over the baked crust
Crumble the reserved cake mix mixture over the top
Bake for an additional 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until filling is set and the topping is lightly toasted
